title:
Feature:  User navigates to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the MLB home page
   And has hovered over "Fantasy" in the top nav bar
custom_steps:
When the mega menu opens, clicks "2019 Postseason Bracket 
   Challenge"
custom_expected:
Then the user lands on the 2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge page of
   the MLB site

title: Feature: Bracket page content
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page:
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/fantasy/postseason-bracket-challenge
custom_steps: When the user views the page
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to see Facebook, Twitter and email icons
   And copy reading "Tap the logos below to pick who will win each series"
   And a banner that reads:  "2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge;
     Win $250,000
   And, under the banner, copy that reads:  "Select the teams you think will win each Postseason series and then answer the tiebreaker questions to submit your entry.  Get the highest point total and you could win $5,000!
   And a bracket showing 5 American League seeded teams
   And an adjoining bracket showing 5 National League seeded teams
   And logos, in the appropriate locations for:
   - American League Wild Card
   - National League Wild Card
   - ALDS and NLDS
   - ALCS and NLCS
   - World Series presented by <YouTube TV>

title: Feature:  AL Wild Card team selection
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps:
When the user selects a team from the AL Wild Card 
bracket options
custom_expected:
Then the selected team is visible in the ALDS column, above the
   Seed No.1 team

title: Feature:  NL Wild Card team selection
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps:
When the user selects a team from the  NL Wild Card 
bracket options
custom_expected:
Then the selected team is visible in the NLDS column, above the
   Seed No.1 team

title: Feature:  ALDS selections
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made an AL Wild Card selection
custom_steps:
When the user selects (2) teams from the ALDS column
(Tester note: Change selections multiple times before making a
final selection)
custom_expected: Then the correct selected teams populate in the ALCS column

title: Feature:  NLDS selections
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made an NL Wild Card selection
custom_steps:
When the user selects (2) teams from the NLDS column
(Tester note: Change selections multiple times before making 
a final selection)
custom_expected: Then the correct selected teams populate in the NLCS column

title: Feature:  ALCS selections
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made ALDS selections
custom_steps:
When the user selects one team from the ALDS column
(Tester note: Change selections multiple times before making a 
final selection)
custom_expected:
Then the correct team displays in the center, "2019 World Series" column,
   in the left-hand (AL) position

title: Feature:  NLCS selections
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made NLDS selections
custom_steps:
When the user selects one team from the NLDS column
(Tester note: Change selections multiple times before making a 
final selection)
custom_expected:
Then the correct team displays in the center, "2019 World Series" column,
   in the right-hand (NL) position

title: Feature:  World Series selection
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made ALCS and NLCS selections
custom_steps: When the user selects a team from the final two clubs
custom_expected:
Then the selected team logo displays at the top of the "World Series"
column, above the team logos of the two finalists
   And, once the final selection is made, the "Tiebreakers" section 
   of the page displays

title: Feature:  World Series selection (negative)
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made ALCS and NLCS selections
custom_steps: When the user selects only one team from the final two clubs
custom_expected: Then the user is  not be able to submit the form if the bracket is not completed

title: Page behavior with Ad Blocker on
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the MLB home page
    And the user has enabled an 'ad blocker' tool
custom_steps:
When the user navigates the page
   And selects teams on the page (up to the World Series)
custom_expected:
Then the selections are made correctly
   And with no hesitancy
   And with no error messages

title: Page behavior with Ad Blocker off
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the MLB home page
    And the user has disabled 'ad blocker' tool
custom_steps:
When the user navigates the page
   And selects teams on the page (up to the World Series)
custom_expected:
Then the selections are made correctly
   And with no hesitancy
   And with no error messages

title: Feature:  Share Voting page
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has completed his/her WS selections 
   And entered the Tiebreaker data
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to a new page where they are able to share their 
   votes 
   And given the option to vote again
   And receives a confirmation email.

title: Feature:  Choices retained after selections are saved and page is refreshed
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made ALCS and NLCS selections
   And has selected Submit.
custom_steps: When the user refreshes the page
custom_expected: Then the previous picks are retained and correct

title: Feature:  Selections are revised, selections submitted and page refreshed
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page 
   And has made ALCS and NLCS selections
   And has selected Submit.
custom_steps:
When the user revises their selections
   And refreshes the page
custom_expected: Then the revised selections display and are correct

title: Feature:  Tiebreakers section
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has completed the entire bracket 
   And selected a Champion team
custom_steps: When the user scrolls down the page
custom_expected: Then the "Tiebreakers" section of the page is visible

title: Feature:  Tiebreaker section details
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has completed the entire bracket 
   And selected a Champion team
   And scrolled to the "Tiebreakers" section of the page
custom_steps: When the user views the Questions and  "Tiebreakers" section of the page
custom_expected:
Then 2 questions and 2 Tiebreaker questions and response
   drop downs (to select a value) display 

Question1:  Pick the MVP of the World Series
Answer 2: (User is only able to enter a player from a team represented in the bracket challenge)
Question 2:  Pick the total games played in the World Series 
Answer 2:  (4, 5, 6, 7)

Tie Breaker Questions:
Question 1:  Pick the total home runs hit in the entire 2019 postseason
Question 2: Pick the total runs scored in the 2019 World Series

   And these fields are visible:
   - First Name
   - Last Name
   - Email address
   - Date of Birth DD's (MM DD YYYY)
   - State/Province
   - Captcha
   - "I would like to receive commercial e-mails from MLB.com and their partners." 
       checkbox
   - "By submitting you acknowledge that you have read, understand and agree to be bound by our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy." links
   - "Submit"
   - "NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN..." copy

title:
Feature:  Tiebreaker selections are not retained after 
   page is refreshed
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has completed the entire bracket 
   And selected a Champion team
custom_steps: When the user refreshes the page
custom_expected:
Then the selections made by the user do not persist
   And must be re-entered

title: Feature:  User data is entered
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge" page, during the live state
of the 2019 PS Bracket Challenge and has completed his/her bracket
selections"
custom_steps:
When the user completes the "Tiebreaker" fields
   And enters text in these fields:
   - Email address
   - Date of Birth DD's (MM DD YYYY)
   - Select Country DD
   - Select Your Favorite Team DD
   And clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected:
Then the "Thanks for playing..." page displays
   And the user's data is acquired

title:
Feature:  User's favorite team is not 
entered
(negative)
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge" page, during the live state
of the 2019 PS Bracket Challenge and has completed his/her bracket
selections"
custom_steps:
When the user completes the "Tiebreaker" fields
   And enters text in these fields:
   - First Name
   - Last Name
   - Email address
   - Date of Birth DD's (MM DD YYYY)
   - State/Province
   - But does not select a Favorite Team 
   And clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected: Then an error message displays:  You must choose a favorite team.

title:
Feature:  User's email address is not 
entered
(negative)
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge" page, during the live state
of the 2019 PS Bracket Challenge and has completed his/her bracket
selections"
custom_steps:
When the user completes the "Tiebreaker" fields
   And enters text in these fields:
   - But does not enter an Email address

   - First Name
   - Last Name
   - Date of Birth DD's (MM DD YYYY)
   - State/Province
   And clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected: Then an error message displays:  You entered an invalid email

title:
Feature:  User forgets to enter tiebreaker
selections
(negative)
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge" page, during the live state
of the 2019 PS Bracket Challenge and has completed his/her bracket
selections"
custom_steps:
When the user neglects to enter the "Tiebreaker" fields
   And enters text in these fields:
   - First Name
   - Last Name
   - Email address
   - Date of Birth DD's (MM DD YYYY)
   - State/Province
   And clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected:
Then an error message displays:  Please enter a value for all tiebreaker 
   questions

title: Feature: Users under the age of 18 will be redirected to a COPPA page
custom_preconds: Given user enters a date of birth for 18 year old or under
custom_steps: When the user clicks submit, they will be given an error message. When trying to reload the ballot homepage
custom_expected: Then the user is directed to a COPPA page

title: Feature:  Social media link icons display
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps: When the user views the page
custom_expected: Then Facebook, Twitter and email icons are visible

title: Feature:  Facebook link icon function
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the Facebook icon
custom_expected:
Then the "Share on Facebook" modal opens 
   And shows the "2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge" banner
   And standard Facebook buttons and links that allow user to share
   And the standard "Post to Facebook" button

title: Feature:  Twitter link icon function
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the Twitter icon
custom_expected:
Then the "Share a link with your follower" modal opens 
   And shows a textbox with a pre-populated message that user can
      post or revise
   And the user's name and avatar in the top-right corner
   And the standard Twitter Tweet" button

title: Feature:  Email icon function
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the Email icon
custom_expected:
Then an email template opens 
   And includes copy pertaining to the 2019 Bracket Challenge" that
      the user may send or modify
   And displays a link to the "2019 Bracket Challenge" page on the MLB site

title:
Feature:  Social Share on Thank You for 
Voting Page. I
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps:
When the user selects the teams for the entire bracket
   And completes the Tiebreaker and Personal sections of the page
   And clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected:
Then the "Thank You for Voting" page shows social media icons
   - Facebook
   - Twitter

title: Feature: Postseason Bracket Challenge is SEO friendly
custom_preconds: Given: the user navigates to a web search engine
custom_steps: When the user searches for 'Postseason Bracket Challenge'
custom_expected:
Then the search engine (e.g. Google) renders all content/links through the 
   Google Search Console.
   And the metadata does not show the year

title: Feature:  Sponsorship skins
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps: When the user views the page
custom_expected: Then the Sponsored skin Desktop displays: 728 x 90

title:
Feature:  User navigates to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" page
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the MLP app 
   And taps the ellipsis icon (bottom-right of screen)
custom_steps:
When the user taps the "2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge"
   link
custom_expected:
Then the user lands on the 2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge screen of
   the MLB mobile site

title: Feature: Bracket page (top half) content
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
custom_steps: When the user views the top-half of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to see Facebook, Twitter and email icons
   And copy reading "Tap the logos below to pick who will win each series"
   And a banner that reads:  "2019 Postseason Bracket Challenge;
     Win $250,000
   And, under the banner, copy that reads:  "Select the teams you think will 
     win each Postseason series and then answer the tiebreaker questions 
     to submit your entry. Get the highest point total and you could win $250,000!
   And a bracket showing all the postseason teams, including the Wild Card teams

title: Feature: Bracket page (bottom half) content
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
   And has scrolled to the bottom half of the screen
custom_steps: When the user views the bottom-half of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees these 4 tabs:
   - WC (Wild Card)
   - DS (Division Series)
   - LCS (League Championship Series)
   - WS (World Series)
   And below the tabs, the user sees the AL and NL Wild Card Teams

title: Feature:  Selecting teams in the bracket
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
custom_steps: When the user attempts to select any team in the bracket
custom_expected:
Then the page auto-scrolls to the section of the screen where club
   logos are larger and easier to select

title: Feature:  Selecting Wild Card teams
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
   And has scrolled to the bottom half of the screen
custom_steps: When the user selects AL and NL Wild Card teams
custom_expected:
Then the selected team logos are highlighted
   And the teams that were not selected are 'grayed out' (unhighlighted)
   And the selected teams are visible on the bracket (top half of screen)
   And the user is redirected the the "Division Series" screen
   And the WC and DS tabs (under the bracket) are highlighted

title: Feature:  Selecting Division Series teams
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has selected AL and NL Wild Card Teams
   And has been redirected to the "Division Series" 
   selection screen
custom_steps: When the user selects AL and NL "Division Series" teams
custom_expected:
Then the selected team logos are highlighted
   And the teams that were not selected are 'grayed out' (unhighlighted)
   And the selected teams are visible on the bracket (top half of screen)
   And the user is redirected the the "League Championship Series" screen
   And the WC, DS & LCS tabs (under the bracket) are highlighted

title: Feature:  Selecting League Championship Series teams
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has selected Division Series Teams
   And has been redirected to the "League Championship 
   Series" selection screen
custom_steps:
When the user selects AL and NL "League Championship Series" 
   teams
custom_expected:
Then the selected team logos are highlighted
   And the teams that were not selected are 'grayed out' (unhighlighted)
   And the selected teams are visible on the bracket (top half of screen)
   And the user is redirected the the "League Championship Series" screen
   And the WC, DS, LCS & WS tabs (under the bracket) are highlighted

title: Feature:  World Series Championship Team selections
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has selected League Championship Series 
   teams
   And has been redirected to the "World Series" selection 
   screen
custom_steps: When the user selects a team to win the World Series
custom_expected:
Then the selected team logos are highlighted
   And the team that was not selected are 'grayed out' (unhighlighted)
   And the selected team is visible on the bracket (top half of screen)
   And the "Tiebreaker" form displays below the team logos
   And the WC, DS, LCS & WS tabs (under the bracket) are highlighted

title: Feature:  Navigate the selection screens using the tabs
custom_preconds:
Give:  User has made all of his/her selections, but wishes
   to change some of the picks
custom_steps:
When the user taps any of these tabs:
   - WC (Wild Card)
   - DS (Division Series)
   - LCS (League Championship Series)
   - WS (World Series)
custom_expected:
Then the corresponding selection screen opens and previous 
   selections display 
   And the selections may be edited

title: Feature:  Next > arrow visible
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
custom_steps: When the user scrolls to the bottom half of the screen
custom_expected: Then, above the drop downs, a "Next >" button is visible

title: Feature:  Next > arrow functional
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
custom_steps: When the user  taps the Next > arrow
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the next screen

title: Feature:  < Previous arrow visible
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the "League Championship"
   selection screen
custom_expected: Then, above the drop downs, a "< Previous" button is visible

title: Feature:  < Previous arrow functional
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the 2019 "Postseason
Bracket Challenge" screen
custom_steps: When the user  taps the "< Previous" arrow
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the previous screen

title: Feature:  Sponsorship skins
custom_preconds:
Given:  the user has navigated to the  
"2019 Bracket Challenge" page
custom_steps: When the user views the page
custom_expected: Then the Sponsored skin Mobile displays: 320 X 50
